answer.b: <fuzzy>Met: AUG, Lys: AAA/AAG, Cys: UGU/UGC, Ile: AUU/AUC/AUA (12 possibilities)
answer.c: <fuzzy>Strong Root: XY is strong if XYA, XYG, XYC, and XYU encode the same amino acid (e.g., UC, CC, CG, GC). Weak Root: XY is weak if not all combinations encode the same amino acid (e.g., UU, CA, AG, GA).

explanation.rules:
| First Base | Second Base | Third Base(s)            | Amino Acid / Function |
|:----------:|:-----------:|:------------------------:|:----------------------:|
| U          | U           | UUU, UUC                 | Phe                   |
| U          | U           | UUA, UUG                 | Leu                   |
| U          | C           | UCU, UCC, UCA, UCG       | Ser                   |
| U          | A           | UAU, UAC                 | Tyr                   |
| U          | A           | UAA, UAG                 | STOP                  |
| U          | G           | UGU, UGC                 | Cys                   |
| U          | G           | UGA                      | STOP                  |
| U          | G           | UGG                      | Trp                   |
| C          | U           | CUU, CUC, CUA, CUG       | Leu                   |
| C          | C           | CCU, CCC, CCA, CCG       | Pro                   |
| C          | A           | CAU, CAC                 | His                   |
| C          | A           | CAA, CAG                 | Gln                   |
| C          | G           | CGU, CGC, CGA, CGG       | Arg                   |
| A          | U           | AUU, AUC, AUA            | Ile                   |
| A          | U           | AUG                      | Met (Start)           |
| A          | C           | ACU, ACC, ACA, ACG       | Thr                   |
| A          | A           | AAU, AAC                 | Asn                   |
| A          | A           | AAA, AAG                 | Lys                   |
| A          | G           | AGU, AGC                 | Ser                   |
| A          | G           | AGA, AGG                 | Arg                   |
| G          | U           | GUU, GUC, GUA, GUG       | Val                   |
| G          | C           | GCU, GCC, GCA, GCG       | Ala                   |
| G          | A           | GAU, GAC                 | Asp                   |
| G          | A           | GAA, GAG                 | Glu                   |
| G          | G           | GGU, GGC, GGA, GGG       | Gly                   |
